metadata.title: Replicas of Fasting Buddha placed in National Museum Bangkok, Vietnam

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jul 31 (APP): The replicas of the Fasting Buddha, gifted by Pakistan, found their place at the National Museum, Bangkok (Thailand) and in Vietnam's Ninh Binh province. According to the Foreign Office on Thursday, it was a moment of pride for Pakistan as these timeless emblems of shared spiritual heritage reflected the enduring cultural and civilizational bonds between Pakistan and Southeast Asia.
